nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

partnerName.description: Name of the company of the partner

productName.description: Name of the product of the partner that created the assessment

secret.description: Secret to authenticate the partner and verify it created the assessment - write only

SecurityAssessmentMetadataPartnerData.description: Describes the partner that created the assessment

assessmentType.description: BuiltIn if the assessment based on built-in Azure Policy definition, Custom if the assessment based on custom Azure Policy definition

items.description: The category of resource that is at risk when the assessment is unhealthy

description.description: Human readable description of the assessment

displayName.description: User friendly display name of the assessment

implementationEffort.description: The implementation effort required to remediate this assessment

policyDefinitionId.description: Azure resource ID of the policy definition that turns this assessment calculation on

preview.description: True if this assessment is in preview release status

remediationDescription.description: Human readable description of what you should do to mitigate this security issue

severity.description: The severity level of the assessment

userImpact.description: The user impact of the assessment

SecurityAssessmentMetadataProperties.description: Describes properties of an assessment metadata.
